entry.title: Starting over
entry.summary:
Author: Boats_McGie

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,425Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 35

Summary: After Joker takes over Gotham and reveals Batman's identity, 19 year old Bruce Wayne flees to Pelican Town with Alfred to start a new life. Giving up all of his finances, the once Dark Knight has to learn how to live on a farm and make friends with the locals so that he and his trusted butler may live a normal life once again. *Literally came to me in a dream*

entry.title: If I Were
entry.summary:
Author: Sazzysavvy

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 23,004Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 222

Summary: M'gann loves Conner. And Conner loves her. And if sometimes she morphs into someone else for him, that's fine. Right? When they fuck up, and a senior League member find out, what will be the fallout? What will be the price to pay?This was inspired by that one scene in Young Justice where M'gann morphed into Black Canary and made out with Conner. I'm not a huge fan of M'gann, but after that scene, my thoughts just exploded, contemplating M'gann's abilities, her lack of boundaries, and desire to please Conner. It's hard enough figuring out sex as a regular teenager. But what if you were a shapeshifting, telepathic Martian? What kind of trouble could you get up to? And of course Superbat, because that relationship is still my North Star.

entry.title: Brighter than my eyes can bear
entry.summary:
Author: white_zane

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,975Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 11

Summary: Bruce had never thought that he’d see a sunray this bright in the dark pit of despair that he called home. And yet, here Superman was, visiting Gotham for the first time. Of course, Batman acted like he didn’t want the meta here. He could handle his city alone. But in the face of an alien invasion, causing Gotham to be cut off from the rest of the USA entirely, he couldn’t really refuse his help anymore. Not when he clearly needed it. Batman might be prideful, but he wasn’t going to let more people get endangered because of that.And at the same time, he couldn’t help but feel like he was looking at an angel every time he saw Superman from the corner of his eye. He had to take a closer look at those eyes one day, they looked straight up otherworldly. Well, they kind of were, but still- OR: When they first meet, Bruce really hates Superman, but also can't figure out why he feels so strongly about him. Superman, on the other hand, finds the dark knight just really off putting. Off putting enough to keep on being around him as much as possible, for some reason.

entry.title: So This Is How Multiverse Lawsuits Start
entry.summary:
Author: MaskSoully

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,388Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 10

Summary: You’re fictional,” Francesca says, already regretting it. Superman stares at her.Batman exhales “I suspected,” he says.“YOU WHAT,” Francesca shrieks.Bruce Wayne sets her phone on the counter. Her phone. The one she didn't even notice was missing. “There are films about us.”Clark goes very, very still.Francesca covers her face with her hands. “I’m so sorry. Don't tell me you went into Twitter,” Francesca gasps, "Don't tell me you went into Ao3"Bruce quirked his eyebrow in response. "Oh man..."Francesca was just a girl. A normal girl. Definitely a little too online. More enamored with a world filled with superheroes and powers. Worlds she could never touch.Until Superman and Batman appear in her kitchen.Now Francesca is tangled in something much bigger than fandom and fiction: a government conspiracy, impossible technology, and the unsettling realization that these two men didn’t cross worlds because of a threat in theirs—But because someone in hers figured out how to pull them through.

entry.title: A Song of Prayer (That Finds No Melody)
entry.summary:
Author: batsbysupers

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,271Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 1

Summary: Carefully, He glued ravens’ feathers on its head with candle wax and poured the blue sea’s waters where the eyes should be. He tugged at the delicate wood to shape its lean limbs, then cut them open and filled them with cotton batting before sewing them close again with weeds threaded on golden needles. For its torso, He bent a silver thimble into slopes and edges that could hold a red marble at the center. He blew cold gusts into its rifts to clean them from dust and spilled boiling water into them to keep the warmth. He poured patience on its head and let it settle. He pressed love onto its chest and let it linger. Or: an AU of Batman: The Knight (2023) in which Clark is Bruce’s guardian angel.

entry.title: A Kryptonian and His Gladiator
entry.summary:
Author: Eyeslikedawn

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 33,301Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 113

Summary: Kryptonian society on the conquered planet Earth is complicated to say the least. When Lord Kal-El's house-guard is slain he decides to rebuild his ranks by purchasing a prized gladiator from Gotham City. His name is Bruce Wayne but the fans of the arena know him as Batman. Regardless of what they call him, though, with the human's stoic demeanor, and grim attitude, Kal has certainly bought more than he bargained for.

Author: philmphobia

Summary: Bruce Wayne finding himself at the front and centre of a public scandal is nothing new. Falling from a building and being scooped up by The Batman like a damsel in distress, however, is very new. To help cope with the never-ending demands for information on the ever illusive Batman, Bruce hires quiet, calm, unsuspecting reporter Clark Kent to help set the record straight. How was Bruce to know his plan would backfire so spectacularly?

entry.title: Christmas in Gotham
entry.summary:
Author: YourFriendMars

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,657Chapters: 4/5Kudos: 0

Summary: It's Christmas in Gotham and all Bruce wants is to patrol. While the kids come up with a scheme to help their own way, Clark decides to try to help by talking to him. “Holiday’s are about spending time with family. Maybe not everyone downstairs is related by blood, but I guarantee you still have a father figure and children. Adopted and birth given alike. Found family still has the word family in it. If you would just let them act like it.”“What are you implying, Clark? That I shouldn’t care about the rest of my city because some random guy decided that today was special?” Bruce questioned, furrowing his brow. He scoffed and took his last sip of wine, frowning when he realized he’d drunk it all already.“Well…yes,” Clark replied quietly. “Not exactly, but yes. Today is a day off, Bruce. A day off from being Playboy Billionaire and Wayne Enterprises Owner Bruce Wayne and a day off from being Gotham City’s Dark Knight Batman. Spend time with the people you care about.”The reporter took a bold step forward, reaching out to grab his friend’s free hand, holding in between both of his hands. He could hear Bruce’s heart rate steadily pick up a few beats, causing his own heart to do a flip of its own.

Summary: The one that Bruce is devastated over a reporter he has just officially met the previous week. However, he can always count on Superman to cheer him up and take him to bed. — What have led you to walk around Gotham during the night? — A moment of silence. — You don’t need to tell me, you don’t even need to speak to me about any of it. But you were angry… and hurt. You were even doing something dangerous when facing that men on the alley. Do you seriously think doing something rash is the answer? Bruce sighs, he really does not want to rationalize anything at the moment, that is the reason why he probes: — Who would not want to put their hands on Superman?

entry.title: As Though the Sun Will Never Set
entry.summary:
Author: HeavenlyVolley

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 284,603Chapters: 22/65Kudos: 623

Summary: Bruce Wayne has done something to get him sent to live with the Kents, he thought it would be boring (It is), but he soon finds himself caught between something dangerous and too unnatural. There are factions moving in to claim his prize, his newly found trump card and he's not ready to let it go. Enter Clark, the soft-spoken Kansas farm boy, just a little too wholesome, a little too comfortable with cows and crickets and just a little too strong for his own good. As Bruce enters the plotters and begins weaving his web of seduction and treachery, mundanity seems further and further away, slipping through Clark's fingers. OR The one in which they are both trapped and enslaved by Clark's growing sexual desire and his alien physiology. (They have a lot of sex, sometimes, Bruce doesn't or can't consent) oh, and major feels too, I guess.

entry.title: so beautiful inside. (don’t you know, it’s torturous?)
entry.summary:
Author: Phenomamal

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,693Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 20

Summary: Batman and Superman form an uneasy alliance, working together to defend their sister cities from Gotham’s and Metropolis’s criminal underworlds. That fragile balance shatters when Lex Luthor creates a clone using his and Superman’s DNA, gaining access to the Fortress of Solitude and revealing footage of Superman’s parents’ true intentions to the world, twisting public perception and striking at the heart of the heroes’ partnership. The fallout is immediate. Bruce’s guarded distrust snaps back into place, sharper than ever, while Clark is fully aware of how damning the revelations appear, is deeply hurt that the trust he fought so hard to earn could be dismantled so easily, and by Luthor of all people. Batman still has too many unanswered questions, and he intends to uncover the truth by any means necessary. Cue the stalking. Clark only wishes he would just ask.   3 chapters a week. Thurs/fri/sat
